mapper.sql: id, subject_name, release_people, college_id, subject_content, subject_number, status, remark, release_time, start_time, end_time, subject_type, manage_time, manage_user
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from subject_info
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into subject_info (id, subject_name, release_people, college_id, subject_content, subject_number, status, remark, release_time, start_time, end_time, subject_type, manage_time, manage_user) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releasePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{collegeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{manageUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into subject_info
id,
subject_name,
release_people,
college_id,
subject_content,
subject_number,
status,
remark,

start_time,
end_time,
subject_type,
manage_time,
manage_user,

#{releasePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.select:
select s.*, count(t.id) as totalNumber from subject_info s left join student_info t on s.id = t.subject_id
and s.subject_name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{fuzzy}),'%') or s.subject_content LIKE concat(concat('%',#{fuzzy}),'%') or s.remark LIKE concat(concat('%',#{fuzzy}),'%')
and s.release_people = #{authId}
GROUP BY s.id
select s.*, count(t.id) as totalNumber from subject_info s left join student_info t on s.id = t.subject_id where s.id = #{id} GROUP BY s.id
mapper.update:
update subject_info
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_name = #{record.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_people = #{record.releasePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
college_id = #{record.collegeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_content = #{record.subjectContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_number = #{record.subjectNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
release_time = #{record.releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
start_time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subject_type = #{record.subjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manage_time = #{record.manageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manage_user = #{record.manageUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update subject_info set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject_name = #{record.subjectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, release_people = #{record.releasePeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, college_id = #{record.collegeId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject_content = #{record.subjectContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject_number = #{record.subjectNumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{record.status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{record.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, release_time = #{record.releaseTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{record.startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{record.endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, subject_type = #{record.subjectType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manage_time = #{record.manageTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manage_user = #{record.manageUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
